body:
Tåîchô (sometimes called "Dogrib" in informal settings) is the Winmac Dene Font (before Unicode) way of writing **Tłı̨chǫ**. This [font hack](http://denefont.tripod.com/) was developed by Jim Stauffer of **Whatì**.

It doesn't really matter if you prefer to create documents using Winmac encoding or the newer Unicode system, but make sure that things that are distributed on the web or in databases are properly managed.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: I <3 Tåîchô
